query: ALTER TABLE escalation_history ADD COLUMN alert_title VARCHAR(255), ADD COLUMN max_level INT DEFAULT 3, ADD COLUMN notifications_sent INT DEFAULT 0, ADD COLUMN auto_resolved_reason TEXT, ADD COLUMN notes TEXT, ADD COLUMN metadata JSON;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bBfAdpTc8yvngq.root --database RpnsLdN3u3f6PBDr9mn7Zq --execute ALTER TABLE escalation_history ADD COLUMN alert_title VARCHAR(255), ADD COLUMN max_level INT DEFAULT 3, ADD COLUMN notifications_sent INT DEFAULT 0, ADD COLUMN auto_resolved_reason TEXT, ADD COLUMN notes TEXT, ADD COLUMN metadata JSON;
